name: Prime Numbers in Spain (Win32 Console)
tagline: my first program/game written in turbo pascal
body:
# Prime Numbers in Spain

``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █       ,--~`~.._                       █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █     ,'         `.                     █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █    ; (((__   __)))                    █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █    ;  ( (o) ( (o)                     █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █    |   \_/___\_/|                     █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █   ,"  ,-'    `__".                    █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █  (   ( ._   ____`.)--._        _      █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █   `._ `-.`-' \(`-'  _  `-. _,-' `-/`. █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █    ,')   `.`._))  ,' `.   `.  ,','  ; █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █  .'   .    `--'  /     ).   `.      ; █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █ ;      `-       /     '  )         ;  █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █ \                       ')       ,'   █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █  \                     ,'       ;     █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █   \               `~~~'       ,'      █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █    `.                      _,'        █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █      `.                ,--'           █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █        `-._________,--'               █  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN │``
``│ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN █████████████████████████████████████████  PrmN  PrmN  mj06 │``
``│                                                                              │``
``│            [ Prime Numbers in Spain! :: An obscure adventure ]               │``
                        ``"Knowing is half the battle"``
``└                                                               Press Enter... ┘``


``│ P██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████N │``
``│ P█                                                                        █N │``
``│ P█ Instructions:                                      ┌───────────────┐   █N │``
``│ P█ -------------                                      │               │   █N │``
``│ P█                                                    │ Prime Numbers │   █N │``
``│ P█   The Basics:                                      │   in Spain!   │   █N │``
``│ P█                                                    │               │   █N │``
``│ P█   "Sword of Omens, give me sight beyond sight!"    └───────────────┘   █N │``
``│ P█   You might ask yourself, what is the meaning to life, the universe    █N │``
``│ P█   and everything else; and the answer lies beneath this game. By       █N │``
``│ P█   'beneath', I mean it is garded by a three headed dog named           █N │``
``│ P█   Alcidecidialanikovivichina and a savage binary eating meerkat        █N │``
``│ P█   pokemon called Kikiokikon with a bad case of Melsis and Polio.       █N │``
``│ P█   "This is the big one! I'm coming to join you, Elizabeth!"            █N │``
``│ P█                                                                        █N │``
``│ P█   But really, that was just a metaphor stating that if your overall    █N │``
``│ P█   IQ is either less than or equal to 55, this game is just a           █N │``
``│ P█   mere distraction in your 'simple' yet carefree life.                 █N │``
``│ P█                                                                        █N │``
``│ P█                                         Press Enter to go to page 2... █N │``
  ``P██████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████N``
``└ PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  PrmN  mj06 ┘``
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
